    FSM

    new FSM(app, transitionTable, stateFetcher, stateUpdater)

    Finite State Machine

    Source:
    • FiniteStateMachine.js, line 69
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    app *

    Application instance, can be null if not needed
    transitionTable object

    { state: { action: { desc, when, target, before, after } } }
    stateFetcher function

    (app, context, fetcherOpts) => state
    stateUpdater function

    (app, context, payload, targetState, updaterOpts) => [actuallyUpdated, updateResult]

    Action rule: desc: description of this transition when: pre transition condition check target: target state before: transforming before applying to the state, can be async after: trigger another action after transition, can be async

    Members

    (static) OK

    OK result
